PropertyDef.Name: EvaporatorCoolant
PropertyDef.Definition: The fluid used for the coolant in the evaporator.

PropertyDef.Name: EvaporatorMediumType
PropertyDef.Definition: ColdLiquid: Evaporator is using liquid type of fluid to exchange heat with refrigerant.\X\0D ColdAir: Evaporator is using air to exchange heat with refrigerant.

PropertyDef.Name: ExternalSurfaceArea
PropertyDef.Definition: External surface area (both primary and secondary area).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeatTransferArea
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal heat transfer surface area associated with nominal overall heat transfer coefficient.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeatTransferCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal overall heat transfer coefficient associated with nominal heat transfer area.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), provided, if there is no classification reference to a recognized classification system used.

PropertyDef.Name: RefrigerantClass
PropertyDef.Definition: Refrigerant class used by the compressor.\X\0D CFC: Chlorofluorocarbons.\X\0D HCFC: Hydrochlorofluorocarbons.\X\0D HFC: Hydrofluorocarbons.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).
